item.title: Representation of Undirected Graph Models
item.description: Koller’s book Probabilistic Graphical Models: Principles and Techniques is the most exhaustive book I have found for PGM, however, there are many definitions, theorems and mathematics within it which make the book hard to understand. When I read this book, I meet many questions like why the potential function is defined on clique. This post summiarizes my understanding of the representation of undirected graph model part in Koller’s book. I also broww some ideas from Micheal I. Jordan’s unfinished book An Introduction to Probabilistic Graphical Model
